DOC.criteria: Female Age 21 65 History stage 1 , 2 , 3 breast cancer Completed primary treatment ( chemotherapy , radiation , and/or surgical treatment ) breast cancer ( without maintenance therapy ) within last 3 month 5 year provide consent Be willing/able attend group assessment Gainesville Jacksonville BMI 27 45 kg/m2 Weightstable , i.e. , lost/gained â‰¥ 10 lb precede 6 month , since end primary treatment History bariatric surgery Pregnant , lactating , plan become pregnant next 12 month . Irritable bowel syndrome Serious infectious disease Chronic malabsorption syndrome Uncontrolled angina within past 6 month History musculoskeletal chronic lung diseases limit physical activity Serum creatinin > 1.5 mg/dL Uncontrolled insulindependent diabetes ( i.e. , hemoglobin A1c < 10 g/dL , fast serum triglyceride > 400 mg/dL ; oral medication exclusionary ) Atrest blood pressure > 140/90 mg/Hg Myocardial infarction Stroke Congestive heart failure Chronic hepatitis Cirrhosis Chronic pancreatitis History solid organ transplantation Cancer treatment within past 5 year ( breast cancer ) Any physical condition ( history breast cancer ) deem likely limit 5year life expectancy significantly interfere individual ' ability participate lifestyle intervention involve eat physical activity change . Use antipsychotic medication , monoamine oxidase inhibitor , systemic corticosteroid , human immunodeficiency virus tuberculosis antibiotic , chemotherapeutics medication , weightloss medication .
